title: YouTube Music rolls out a revamped playlist UI to some users
content:
YouTube Music has been steadily gaining new features and improvements as of late. In March, the service picked up Snapchat integration, allowing users to share their favorite songs on Snapchat Stories. Then last month, the streaming service added a couple of new features such as an improved radio algorithm for better artist discovery, Family Shelf,

The post YouTube Music rolls out a revamped playlist UI to some users appeared first on XDA.
description: The latest YouTube Music update brings a redesigned playlist UI. The new UI moves the album cover art to the center.
